V0315_01_00_00_0.text:
Yes, let's play!
This will be so much fun!

V0315_01_00_02_1.text:
Sorry to startle you!
I promise it's not that scary.

V0315_01_00_03_0.text: I don't know how I'll fare, but I am up for the challenge!

V0315_01_00_04_0.text:
What? I have to face Yugi!?
Please go gentle.

V0315_01_00_05_0.text: I want to Duel against everyone too!

V0315_01_00_09_0.text: My friends and I won't let you take control of me anymore!

V0315_01_00_11_0.text:
It's Maximillion Pegasus!
The creator of this game!

V0315_03_00_00_0.text: I think I'm going to win!

V0315_03_00_01_0.text: If you don't survive this turn, you'll lose.

V0315_03_00_05_0.text: I must find a way to win...

V0315_05_00_00_0.text: I need a super critical card for this super critical time!

V0315_07_09_00_0.text: I flip over my Set card!

V0315_07_09_01_0.text: This is the card I Set!

V0315_11_01_00_0.text: I Summon a monster in Defense Position!

V0315_21_00_00_0.text: I'm the game master of this Duel!

V0315_21_00_02_0.text: That brings my turn to an end!

V0315_21_00_04_0.text: I don't see any way I can win...

V0315_28_00_01_0.text: Thank you for such an entertaining Duel!

V0315_28_00_02_0.text: My Occult Deck did scare you!

V0315_28_00_03_0.text:
I had to win.
I'm what's known as a gamer.

V0315_28_00_04_0.text: Playing with friends is always a great time!

V0315_28_00_04_1.text: I wish we could keep Dueling forever!

V0315_28_00_05_0.text: The Ring used to control me, but it no longer does.

V0315_28_00_05_1.text:
Still, I am so sorry.
I know it’s not easy to lose someone.

V0315_28_00_07_0.text: I won't let you possess me anymore!

V0315_29_00_00_0.text: There's no way I can defeat a deck that powerful.

V0315_29_00_01_0.text: You're a master of this game.

V0315_29_00_02_0.text:
Ouch...
Did you have to play so hard?

V0315_29_00_03_0.text:
Sigh...
I had no chance at all...

V0315_29_00_04_0.text: Yugi, you truly are the best Duelist!

V0315_29_00_05_0.text: How can anyone defeat a deck that has three Blue-Eyes!?

V0315_29_00_07_0.text:
I cannot take back what I've done.
And for that, I am sorry.

V0315_29_00_08_0.text: No matter when we Duel, you prove you're the strongest.

V0315_29_00_09_0.text:
It's not fair!
You created the best cards for yourself!

V0315_29_00_10_0.text:
No...
I can't let you control me again...

V0315_33_00_00_0.text: I'm more talented than I look!

V0315_33_00_02_0.text: Quite the unique strategy, don't you think?

V0315_30_00_00_0.text: Do you ever get the feeling that someone is watching you?

V0315_30_00_01_0.text:
The Ring no longer controls me.
That's in the past.

V0315_30_00_02_0.text: The Millennium Ring was the source of every problem.

V0315_34_00_00_0.text:
Sorry!
I pulled an all-nighter writing my RPG.

V0315_34_00_01_0.text: Wow! You know a lot about your cards!

V0315_34_00_02_0.text: Why can't you play cards that would help me?

V0315_34_00_03_0.text: I see why you're so confident.

V0315_34_00_04_0.text: The more grotesque the card, the more I adore it!

V0315_34_00_05_0.text:
That's a good card.
I wish I had that in my deck!

V0315_34_00_09_0.text: That wasn't supposed to happen! I'm the worst!

V0315_35_00_01_0.text: My Occult Deck is quite spooky!

V0315_08_00_00_0.text: I shall activate my Spell Card, Change of Heart!

V0315_08_00_01_0.text: I activate the Continuous Spell, The Dark Door!

V0315_08_00_02_0.text: I activate the Continuous Spell, Ectoplasmer!

V0315_08_00_04_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, The Shallow Grave!

V0315_08_00_05_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Dark Spirit's Mastery!

V0315_08_00_06_0.text: I banish Dark Spirit's Mastery from the Graveyard!

V0315_08_00_07_0.text: I activate the Field Spell, Dark Sanctuary!

V0315_08_00_09_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Spiritualism!

V0315_08_00_10_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Seal of the Ancients!

V0315_08_00_11_0.text:
I activate my Continuous Trap!
Destiny Board!

V0315_08_00_12_0.text: Destiny Board is writing a message on the field.

V0315_08_00_13_0.text:
I activate my Continuous Trap!
Zoma the Spirit!

V0315_08_00_14_0.text: When Zoma the Spirit is destroyed, its effect activates!

V0315_08_00_15_0.text: I activate the Trap Card, Dark Spirit of the Silent!

V0315_08_00_16_0.text: I activate my Continuous Trap, Sentence of Doom!

V0315_08_00_17_0.text: I shall use Sentence of Doom's effect!

V0315_08_00_18_0.text:
I activate my Trap Card!
Call of the Earthbound!

V0315_09_00_00_0.text: Insect Queen Special Summons an Insect Monster Token!

V0315_09_00_03_0.text: Necroface's effect activates when it's summoned!

V0315_09_00_05_0.text: Dark Spirit of Banishment's effect activates!

V0315_09_00_06_0.text: Dark Spirit of Malice's effect activates!

V0315_09_00_09_0.text: I activate Outer Entity Azathot's effect!

V0315_13_00_00_0.text: I enjoy the creepy-looking cards - like this one!

V0315_13_00_01_0.text: I always wanted to include this card in my deck!

V0315_13_00_15_0.text: I Special Summon Zoma the Spirit in Defense Position!

V0315_13_00_16_0.text: This monster's so grotesque you'll faint in fear!

V0315_13_00_17_0.text:
This monster is creepy...
I love it!
